amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for procurements in contravention of the Buy American Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1336 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1336 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S9757-9758; text: CR S9757) To prohibit the use of funds for procurements in contravention of the Buy American Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1336 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1336 proposed by Senator Dayton.
